sentences.en: a child’s attachment to its mother
a child's strong attachment to its parents
sentences.cn: 孩子对父母的强烈依恋

sentences.en: But while we all have this need for attachment, the way we show it differs.
sentences.cn: 然而尽管我们都拥有这种依恋需要，但是我们表现出来的方式是不一样的。

sentences.en: Dinah would contract such an immoderate attachment to her scoured tin.
sentences.cn: 黛娜对于那些擦得亮晶晶的锡器会忽然倍加宠爱起来.

sentences.en: During her course she worked on attachment for six months at Kew Gardens.
sentences.cn: 在上学期间，她曾临时到基尤植物园工作了6个月。

sentences.en: I observe that you have an attachment to low and common company.
sentences.cn: 我注意到:你专爱和不三不四的人在一块.

sentences.en: Justice Fitzgerald included a 120-page discussion paper as an attachment to the annual report.
sentences.cn: 在年度报告上，法官菲茨杰拉德附上了一篇长达120页的讨论稿。

sentences.en: Mother and child form a close attachment.
Of course he theorized a little about his attachment.
sentences.cn: 不言而喻,他为他的爱情找出了一些理论根据.

sentences.en: Please do not send your resume by attachment.
sentences.cn: 请勿以附件形式发送简历。

sentences.en: Proximity seeking is commonly interpreted as an index of infant - to - parent attachment.
sentences.cn: 对父母追寻亲近通常被解释为婴儿对双亲的附着依恋标志.

sentences.en: She has a great attachment to her sister.
She's on attachment to the Ministry of Defense.
Surging is ordinarily associated with separation and re - attachment in the diffuser.
sentences.cn: 喘振通常与气流在扩散段内的分离和再附相联系.

sentences.en: The attachment of the new engine to the car only took a few minutes.
sentences.cn: 把新发动机装在汽车上只用了几分钟.

sentences.en: the attachments that secure your boots firmly to the skis
sentences.cn: 把靴子牢牢固定在滑雪板上的扣件

sentences.en: The broadbased attachment of the mesenteric root stabilizes the small bowel.
sentences.cn: 肠系膜根部基底宽阔的附着面使小肠得以稳定.

sentences.en: The vacuum cleaner has various attachments.
sentences.cn: 这台真空吸尘器有各种附件。

sentences.en: When you send an e-mail you can also send a sound or graphic file as an attachment.
sentences.cn: 在发送电子邮件时，你也可以附上一份声音或图片文件。

words.tran_cn: 可附上的；可连接的；可逮捕的；可没收的
附加的；依恋的，充满爱心的
使依附；贴上；系上；使依恋
[机]附件；依恋；连接物；扣押财产

phrases.tran_cn: (英格兰律)收入抵扣（根据法院裁定，从债务人的收入中直接扣除一部分用以还债）
阀值；附着点；附保点；接合点

trans.tran_cn: 爱慕，信念，忠诚，附件，连接，短期在…工作
trans.tran_en: a feeling that you like or love someone or something and that you would be unhappy without them
